course.title: ADM 2350 Financial Management (3 units)
course.desc: Financial environment and markets, concepts of valuation, risk and return, cost of capital, capital budgeting under certainty, long-term financing, working capital management, and short-term financing.Course Component: Discussion Group, LecturePrerequisites: ECO 1102, ECO 1104, (ADM 2303 or MAT 2371), (ADM 1340 or ADM 2340).
